original_text: that there may be no division in the body, but that the members may have the same care for one another.
korean_text: 몸 가운데서 분쟁이 없고 오직 여러 지체가 서로 같이 돌보게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: that there may be no division in the body
but that the members may have the same care for one another.
